question: Which Indian cricketer has been appointed as the new Chairman of the ICC Cricket Committee?
explanation: Anil Kumble, a former Indian captain of Tests and ODIs, has been reappointed as the Chairman of the  International Cricket Council (ICC) Cricket Committee for the third consecutive time. This 3-year stint will end in 2021 and be his final term as the Chairman of the ICC Cricket Committee. He was appointed as the head of the panel in the year 2012 for his first term. Kumble was reappointed for his second term in the year 2016 which would keep him in office till 2018.  The ICC Cricket Committee is representative of all stakeholders in the game, including players and umpires. It is empowered to make recommendations on cricket playing issues.
